description: This filling vegan shepherds pie has a lightly crisped potato topping.
name: Shepherds Pie with Lentils Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large white onion, peeled and diced
2 stalks celery, leaves removed and sliced
700g potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large pan to a medium heat and then add the oil.
Fry the onion, garlic, carrot and celery for 4 minutes while tossing.
Add the lentils and herbs and fry for a further 6 minutes while mixing.
Add the vegetable stock and allow to simmer for 40 minutes stirring occasionally.
Cook the potatoes in a pot of salted water for 20 minutes or until soft.
Remove the potatoes from the heat, drain the liquid and mash with a potato masher with the salt and pepper.
In a suitable baking dish, empty the lentil mixture to the bottom and then top that with the potatoes.
Grill in the oven for 10 minutes or until the potatoes start to brown nicely before serving.
